Name: Herbert's Office
Description: Herbert work station. Gross...you just noticed his trash bin is filled with used tissue. I'm just going to assume he has a 'cold'.

PassCommands.CommandText:
Well that got me nowhere... I wonder If I could sneak in anywhere else? You crouch down and go behind the Security Building to see if there is a back door.

Hey what's this? His window is wide open. It leads directly into Herbert's Office. Well if I'm going to do this I have to go now!

Sliding the window open the rest of the way you get in with ease.

[b]CRASH! THUD![/b] On your way through the window you knock a cactus down to the ground and its pot shatters.

"Oh shit I should have tried to scan the room or something before climbing in here. I hope no one heard that...."

You quickly examine the office and see a desk and a computer on top of it.
